Introduction
This topic contains information on determining the amount of accrued, including
paying accrued based on audit error worksheets (AEWs)
computation of accrued amounts
paying accrued benefits when a surviving spouse is entitled to MOD
returned and canceled benefits payable as accrued
recouping overpayments when computing accrued benefits
, and
determining accrued payable when deceased Veteran received military retired pay (MRP) and is entitled to compensation
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
